price: Ẹ tẹ̀lé ẹni tí kò bèèrè owó-ọ̀yà kan ní ọwọ́ yín. Olùmọ̀nà sì ni wọ́n.
arabic: ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَن لَّا يَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ أَجۡرٗا وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ittabiʿū man lā yasalukum ajran wahum muh'tadūna
